rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wide entrance hall to ensure wheelchair accessibility with a gentle ramp integrated.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area following Mediterranean style with high ceilings and exposed beams. Designed for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with an open plan design, accessible layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Mediterranean inspired kitchen, designed with wide work surfaces and accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with wheelchair accessible design including a walk-in closet and built-in storage.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and sufficient maneuvering space.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small room for home appliances, designed to be easily accessible.

openings.description: Wide door with automatic opening system for accessibility.

openings.location: Living Room facing the South (Vastu compliant)
openings.description: Large window to allow natural light and maintain Mediterranean aesthetics.
Accessible door ensuring ease of movement for wheelchair users.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: Accessible via ramp from the living area with a small garden and seating area, designed for relaxation and social gatherings.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: Shallow pool design for safety on a tight budget, with easy access to wheelchair users.
